channel.title: Rawr Pkz Redevelopment
channel.description:
[u]Rawr Pkz Redevelopment[/u] Okay, I decided to redevelopment my server source. However, this server source is based on EvolutionX. You can visit the official thread of the first version of Rawr Pkz with this link: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433176.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433176.0.html[/url] [size=18pt][shadow=red,left]Rawr Pkz II[/shadow][/size] [size=12pt][shadow=red,left]Re-adding KQ and its fellows[/shadow][/size] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/5703/64680086.png[/img] Edited the d claws' specs and its emote [img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/6797/22977556.png[/img] Editing the KQ's drops ( rare items ) [shadow=red,left]- D claws - Anchor - Saradomin sword and maybe an anger sword.[/shadow] Credits
Wireless - for EvolutionX base and client base Me - for adding KQ, KQ's drops, event area and more. Syme - for Admin zone

item.title: Rawr Pkz Redevelopment
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

You added kqueen to a fucking stupid spot and friend added a teleport to an admin zone and that’s your development?

Read full topic

item.title: Rawr Pkz Redevelopment
item.dc:creator: @Koolvin Koolvin
item.description:
@Koolvin wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:7, topic:336878”][quote author=Koolvin link=topic=433293.msg3181889#msg3181889 date=1271381015]

I love how you’re not only trying to resell vBulletin software on your own host which is extremely illegal, you’re probably using nulled versions of vBulletin which makes it even more illegal. Perhaps someone should report that link to Jelsoft for piracy.
[/quote]I enjoy the fact that hes advertising it on his own forum, which isn’t even hosted on an actual webhost, it’s hosted by phpBBfree… Why sell a different product than you’re willing to use yourself? What are you? A politician?

im pretty sure hes so low he just makes a free forum for you lolol[/quote]He most likely doesn’t even have a penis, except for one in his mouth.

Read full topic
